name: 本杰明·雅各布森
name_full: 本杰明·雅各布森 Benjamin Jacobson
introduction: Benjamin displayed his love of performing from a very early age. There was no denying this passion which now extends to creating his own scripts, films, animated shorts, writing musicals, songs, singing and scoring.Benjamin booked his first acting role at the age of 5, a Blueberries commercial. Shortly thereafter, he played the main character as a child in Public Schooled (2017). He has also worked extensively in voice. He booked his first voice role in November of 2017, Nina's World (2015), and has worked non-stop in this area since, booking recurring roles on animated series such as Chip and Potato (2018), Gigantosaurus (2019), Dinosaur Train (2009), and Pup Academy (2019).Benjamin also loves Musical Theatre, has trained extensively in this area and most recently was cast in the Arts Club Theatre Company production of "Elf: The Musical" (Vancouver) which ran from November-December 2023.
